# 541TOP Sailcoach Website - Astro Project

This is a modern Astro website for 541TOP Sailcoach, a sailing training company specialized in Optimist and ILCA classes.

## Project Overview
- Modern responsive design with Astro framework
- TypeScript support for better development experience
- Tailwind CSS for utility-first styling
- Optimized for performance and SEO
- Professional presentation of sailing coaching services

## Key Features
- Landing page with hero section
- Services showcase (Clinics, Charter boats, Regata assistance, Training camps)
- Team presentation with coach profiles
- Company values and mission
- Contact form and WhatsApp integration
- Social media links
- Responsive design for all devices

## Development Stack
- Astro 4.x
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS
- Modern component architecture

## Content Structure
- Hero section with call-to-action
- About section explaining the company mission
- Services section with detailed offerings
- Team section with coach profiles
- Values section highlighting company principles
- Contact section with form and social links
